job.title: Data Science / Machine Learning Engineer / Orlando, FL
job.description: lockheed martins missiles and fire control is seeking a data science machine learning engineer for an exciting orlando fl position you can enjoy working across teams that include other machine learning engineers software engineers system domain experts and project managers to understand the fundamentals of our most challenging technical problems and how machine learning and data analytics may be applied to solve themltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtin this position you willltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt lead the design of ml models frameworks pipelines data strategies and program processes that address these problemsltligtltligt mature products that range from low trl prototypes up to high trl models and pipelines at a production quality and scaleltligtltligt provide leadership and mentorship to junior ml engineersltligtltligt help establish the standard processes that will be applied to development and productionready machine learning solutionsltligtltligt be connected with research in academia and the broader commercial trends and help apply those bestofbreed solutions practically to help solve our technical challengesltligtltulgt
